scripts.alias: now alias $(now ls | awk '{print $2}' | sed '5!d' | sed -e 's/https:\/\///' | sed -e 's/\.now\.sh//') frontendbr
scripts.deploy: now -e APP_PORT=@port -e APP_PATH=@path -e GITHUB_SECRET=@github_secret -e CONSUMER_KEY=@consumer_key -e CONSUMER_SECRET=@consumer_secret -e ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY=@access_token_key -e ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET=@access_token_secret
scripts.postdeploy: git checkout package.json && npm run alias
